# Divine Favor (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 273

Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +1 luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls for every three caster levels you have (at least +1, maximum +3). The bonus doesnâ€™t apply to spell damage.
